channel.title: Comabt Glitch?!
channel.description: Umm yeah i find this common on many servers, I currently have portals with very LOW exp and i made the npcs train much much faster but the thing is, People can train attack and defence just fine but whenver they use it on aggresive to train strenght it hits 5-15? even with 99 str? But when they switch toa ccurate they can hit the average like 30+? Can anyone tell me how to fix this i would really like to get rid of those pesky portals and make it full npc. TY - The (ORIGINAL!) moose.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2007, 05:51:13 AM[/size][hr]hmmmm help pls srry for dp

item.title: Comabt Glitch?!
item.dc:creator: @The_Moose The Moose
item.description:
